title: Samson and Delilah
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures and Cecil B. DeMille
brief_description: Cecil B. De Mille’s famous epic style is highlighted in this classic bible story about the legendary strongman Samson and the temptress Delilah, who helped destroy him. Lauded for its lush cinematography, performances, costumes, sets and special effects, it was a box office smash.

constellations_other.name: Religion, cinema and censorship
constellations_other.description: Religious narratives and themes have a complicated relationship with censorship, with creators pushing the boundaries for better or worse.

description: Cecil B. De Mille’s famous epic style is highlighted in this classic Bible story about the legendary strongman Samson, and the temptress Delilah, who seduced, betrayed and helped to destroy him. Victor Mature is the classic Samson; strong, brave and fearless as he wrestles lions and Philistines bare-handed. Hedy Lamarr is stunning as Delilah; in an array of dazzling and seductive costumes. Action packed, this Biblical epic is a spectacle to enjoy. Also stars George Sanders and Angela Lansbury.
